Arbiter

Promissory Arbiter 


Arbiter.subscribe('code', doSomething);
Arbiter.subscribe('code.write', doAnother);
Arbiter.publish('code.write', data)
  .then(subscribersComplete);

Decouple your code with an asynchronous, hierarchical, promissory observer.
